events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and consolidate existing debt.
Loan application successfully categorized under Personal Loan due to mentions of medical costs and debt consolidation.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to handle the applicant’s file and guide them through the loan process.
Initial review of the application was completed, verifying applicant's basic eligibility and loan purpose for vacation and medical bills.
Applicant was requested to submit proof of income, medical invoices, and recent bank statements to proceed further.
All requested documents including medical bills, income proof, and bank statements have been submitted by the applicant.
Credit check was completed and the applicant's credit history shows a few minor past delinquencies but overall stable profile.
Risk assessment completed considering the credit report, debt-to-income ratio, and loan purpose for personal expenses.
Loan officer presented an offer with favorable interest rates and repayment terms tailored to the applicant's financial situation.
Applicant responded positively to the offer but requested a slight extension of the repayment period for personal convenience.
Application was escalated to senior management to review applicant’s request for repayment term extension.
Senior management approved the loan application with revised repayment terms as requested by the applicant.
Loan amount was disbursed successfully to the applicant's bank account to cover the medical and personal expenses.
Loan officer conducted a follow-up call to ensure the applicant received funds and to answer any post-funding questions.
The loan application process is now closed with all formalities completed and the applicant satisfied with the support provided.
